title: Advanced University Mathematics Course Based on Online Quizzes

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Supports flexible learning schedules for working professionals, emphasizing advanced math concepts applicable to real-world tasks

learning_goals: Learners can apply core university mathematics concepts (e.g., partial differentiation, matrix operations) with 80% accuracy via an online quiz system.
Learners perform over ten sessions of spaced retrieval practice using an automated assessment system.
Learners complete over 90% of the incorrect answer analysis and concept-reinforcement process through the quiz feedback system
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
